mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id user_id, u.user_name user_name, u.user_pwd user_pwd, u.user_mail user_mail, u.user_phonenumber user_phonenumber, u.user_pic user_pic, u.register_date register_date, ur.role_name role_name, ul.lv_name lv_name FROM user u, user_role ur, user_level ul WHERE u.role_id = ur.role_id AND u.lv_id = ul.lv_id AND u.user_name = #{user_mail} AND u.user_pwd = #{user_pwd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( user_id, user_name, user_pwd, user_mail, register_date, role_id, lv_id) VALUE ( #{user.user_id}, #{user.user_name}, #{user.user_pwd}, #{user.user_mail}, #{user.register_date}, #{user.user_role.role_id}, #{user.user_level.lv_id})
